forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.shortForecast: Partly Sunny then Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms after 2pm. Partly sunny. High near 83, with temperatures falling to around 80 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 3 to 9 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
